Episodes.Title: Welcome to Boomtown
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Mirk, Robert Padnick
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Lone wanderer, Sid, and warlord, Freya, struggle to adjust after moving from apocalyptic wasteland to the suburbs.

Episodes.Title: H.O.A.
Episodes.Plot: Freya runs for president of the Boomtown Homeowners Association.; Morris takes Sid on a perilous business trip.

Episodes.Title: The MatriXXX
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Ashley Wigfield, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Sid and Freya try to improve their sex life with couples therapy. Morris attends his high school reunion.

Episodes.Title: The Grouping Ceremony
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Klein, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Sid tries to help Morris get his son Timmy into a prestigious school. Freya attempts to prove to Tai that she's too old to party all night.

Episodes.Title: Jim Carrey in the Park
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Nora Winslow, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Morris puts on a theatrical production of "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective"; Sid goes on a weekend trip with Tai and his friends.

Episodes.Title: Olympus
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Henry Michaels, Tommy Do
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Sid and Freya visit Freya's parents. Morris and Tai share an intimate evening together.

Episodes.Title: Roland Proudheart
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Tommy Do, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Sid buys a flashy new vehicle called a Bifi and it starts to become his whole personality; Scraps returns to his old village.

Episodes.Title: Children of Women
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Matt Walsh, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Sid and Freya finds out she is pregnant and Morris throw a baby shower for them. Tai has to pet sit Scraps while going back in time to terminate the future leader of the human resistance.

Episodes.Title: John Christ
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Mirk, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Freya reunites with her old gang of war dogs; Sid joins an anti-robot extremist group; Tai enters a talent competition to prove he's not obsolete.

Episodes.Title: The End
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Robert Padnick, Henry Michaels
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
